name: What Lies Between
description:
What Lies Between is a 3d platformer focused on speed through mastery of the simple yet
powerful mechanics given. Expanding your potential as you play, gaining new information
and abilities to more effectively navigate the open ended levels.

Give chase to the mysterious creature that brought you to a new reality. Travel through
cities of endless, towering pillars. Forests shrouded in fog. Caverns overrun with shadow.
Snowy peaks above the world. Lands forgotten to time.
Even the very space between reality itself. All in the effort of returning home.

For normal gameplay, Xbox controllers will function.
As of now, menus will need to be navigated using a mouse.
